examples.title: Q&A
examples.tagline: Answer questions based on existing knowledge.
examples.query: Create a keto meal plan for a week for 1500 kcal per day

examples.title: Grammar correction
examples.query:
Correct this to standard English:
She no went to the market.

examples.title: Restaurant review creator
examples.tagline: Turn a few words into a restaurant review.
examples.query:
Write a restaurant review based on these notes:
Name: The Blue Wharf
Lobster great, noisy, service polite, prices good.

examples.title: Classification
examples.tagline: Classify items into categories via example.
examples.query:
The following is a list of companies and the categories they fall into:

Uber, Facebook, Fedex

Apple
Category:

examples.title: English to other languages
examples.tagline: Translates English text into French, Spanish and Japanese.
examples.query:
Translate this into 1. Urdu, 2. Spanish and 3. Punjabi:
What rooms do you have available?

examples.title: Turn by turn directions
examples.tagline: Convert natural language to turn-by-turn directions.
examples.query:
Create a numbered list of turn-by-turn directions from this text:
Go south on 95 until you hit Sunrise boulevard then take it east to us 1 and head south. Tom Jenkins bbq will be on the left after several miles.

examples.title: Notes to summary
examples.tagline: Turn meeting notes into a summary.
examples.query:
Convert my short hand into a first-hand account of the meeting:
Tom: Profits up 50%
Jane: New servers are online
Kjel: Need more time to fix software
Jane: Happy to help
Parkman: Beta testing almost done

examples.title: Summarize for a 2nd grader
examples.tagline: Translates difficult text into simpler concepts.
examples.query:
Summarize this for a second-grade student:
Jupiter is the fifth planet from the Sun and the largest in the Solar System. It is a gas giant with a mass one-thousandth that of the Sun, but two-and-a-half times that of all the other planets in the Solar System combined. Jupiter is one of the brightest objects visible to the naked eye in the night sky, and has been known to ancient civilizations since before recorded history. It is named after the Roman god Jupiter.[19] When viewed from Earth, Jupiter can be bright enough for its reflected light to cast visible shadows,[20] and is on average the third-brightest natural object in the night sky after the Moon and Venus.

examples.query:
Convert movie titles into emoji.
Back to the Future:
Batman:

examples.tagline: Create analogies. Modified from a community prompt to require fewer examples.
examples.query:
Create an analogy for this phrase:
Questions are arrows in that:

examples.title: Natural language to Stripe API
examples.tagline: Create code to call to the OpenAI API using a natural language instruction.
examples.query:
Util exposes the following:
util.stripe() -> authenticates & returns the stripe module; usable as stripe.Charge.create etc
import util
Create a Stripe token using the users credit card: 5555-4444-3333-2222, expiration date 12 / 28, cvc 521

examples.title: Python to natural language
examples.tagline: Explain a piece of Python code in human understandable language.
examples.query:
# Python 3
def remove_common_prefix(x, prefix, ws_prefix):
	x['completion'] = x['completion'].str[len(prefix) :]
	if ws_prefix:
		# keep the single whitespace as prefix
		x['completion'] = ' ' + x['completion']
return x
# Explanation of what the code does

examples.title: Mood to color
examples.tagline: Turn a text description into a color.
examples.query: The CSS code for a color like a blue sky at dusk:

examples.title: Keywords
examples.tagline: Extract keywords from a block of text.
examples.query:
Extract keywords from this text:
Black-on-black ware is a 20th- and 21st-century pottery tradition developed by the Puebloan Native American ceramic artists in Northern New Mexico. Traditional reduction-fired blackware has been made for centuries by pueblo artists. Black-on-black ware of the past century is produced with a smooth surface, with the designs applied through selective burnishing or the application of refractory slip. Another style involves carving or incising designs and selectively polishing the raised areas. For generations several families from Kha'po Owingeh and P'ohwhÃ³ge Owingeh pueblos have been making black-on-black ware with the techniques passed down from matriarch potters. Artists from other pueblos have also produced black-on-black ware. Several contemporary artists have created works honoring the pottery of their ancestors.

examples.title: Ad from product description
examples.tagline: Create product names from examples words. Influenced by a community prompt.
examples.query:
Write a creative ad for the following product to run on Facebook aimed at parents:
Product: Learning Room is a virtual environment to help students from kindergarten to high school excel in school.

examples.title: Third-person converter
examples.tagline: Converts first-person POV to the third-person. This is modified from a community prompt to use fewer examples.
examples.query:
Convert this from first-person to third person (gender female):
I decided to make a movie about Ada Lovelace.
